article_metadata.news-keywords: employee, spouses, health, insurance, coverage, Lincolnton, Hickory, Gaston County, Iredell, Obamacare
article_metadata.description: Several have stopped coverage if the spouse is eligible for coverage at their own workplace. But two cities are eliminating health care benefits for all spouses, regardless of whether they have coverage elsewhere.
article_metadata.title: To cut costs, local governments ending health coverage for spouses | The Charlotte Observer
